member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.ExtractedImageInfo
member.summary: Represents a single occurrence of an image on a PDF page. Encapsulates both the image and its location on the page.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.ExtractedImageInfo.Image
member.summary: Gets the extracted image.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.ExtractedImageInfo.Transformation

remarks.para: This transformation assumes that the original coordinate system has its origin at the lower-left corner and a unit corresponds to a point (1/72 inch). It also assumes that the image is drawn at the origin of the transformed coordinate system as a unit rectangle.

member.summary: Gets the transformation required to draw the image at the right location.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.FontSubstitutionMap
member.summary: Gets a value that lets you define which external fonts are used to render fonts that are not embedded.

member.name: O:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.FontSubstitutionMap.Add
member.overloads: Add a new entry to the map.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.FontSubstitutionMap.Add(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Add a new entry to the map.
member.param: The name of the font to map.

param.name: stream
param.DD: The stream that holds the font program.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.FontSubstitutionMap.Add(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a new entry to the map.
member.param: The name of the font to map.

param.name: file
param.para: The file that holds the font program.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.FontSubstitutionMap.Clear
member.summary: Remove all entries.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.FontSubstitutionMap.FontNames
member.summary: Gets all the font names included in this map.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.FontSubstitutionMap.SearchPath
member.summary: Gets or sets a semi-colon separated list of folders to search for font files that are included in the substitution map. The folders are searched from left to right until the font file is found.
member.remarks: The default value is ".;%FONTDIR%". This means that by default font files will be searched in the current folder first and then in the system font directory (typically c:\windows\fonts).

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page
member.summary: A page inside an existing PDF document. Obtained through the Pages.Item property of the Pages class.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.Width
member.summary: Gets the viewer width of this page in points.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.Height
member.summary: Gets the viewer height of this page in points.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.ArtBox
member.summary: Gets the the dimensions of the page's meaningful content intended by the page's creator.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.BleedBox
member.summary: Gets the dimensions to which the page should be clipped in a production environment.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.CropBox
member.summary: Gets the maximum imageable area of the physical medium on which the page is to be printed.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.MediaBox
member.summary: Gets the maximum imageable area of the physical medium.

summary.para: Gets the dimensions of the finished page after trimming.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.Rotate

summary.para: Gets the counter-clockwise rotation in degrees that the viewer should apply to the page.

member.remarks: If the page does not have an explicit viewer rotation set, 0 is returned.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.SingleImageOnly
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if the content of this PDF page consists of a single image only.
member.remarks: When this value is true, the Page.ExtractImages method is more efficient than rendering the PDF as a Page.

member.name: O:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.Draw
member.overloads: Draws the page context onto a graphics object.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draws the page content using default page boundary and render settings.
member.param: Graphics object to which content is drawn.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics,Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.RenderSettings)
member.summary: Draws the page content using default page boundary.
member.param: Graphics object to which content is drawn.
Settings that control the render process.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics,Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PageBoundary)
member.summary: Draws the page content using default render settings.
member.param: Graphics object to which content is drawn.
The page boundary that is used to draw the PDF page.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics,Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PageBoundary,Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.RenderSettings)
member.summary: Draws the page content.
member.param: Graphics object to which content is drawn.
The page boundary that is used to draw the PDF page.
Settings that control the render process.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Page.ExtractImages
member.summary: Extracts all images on this page.
member.returns: Extracted images. Can be of zero length.
member.remarks: This method will extract each image embedded in a specified page. The method is more efficient for single image PDF pages as it does not resample the image to fit in the indicated resolution.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PageBoundary
member.summary: Different PDF page boundaries that each correspond to a specific imaging or finishing process.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PageBoundary.ArtBox
member.summary: The dimensions of the page's meaningful content as intended by the page's creator. Default to the crop box.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PageBoundary.BleedBox
member.summary: The dimensions to which the page should be clipped in a production environment. Defaults to the crop box.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PageBoundary.CropBox
member.summary: The dimension to which the page should be clipped when displayed or printed. Defaults to the media box.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PageBoundary.Default
member.summary: The dimensions of the intersection of the media box and the crop box. If the crop box is not present, the visible box is set to the media box.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PageBoundary.MediaBox
member.summary: The maximum imageable area of the physical medium on which the page is to be printed.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PageBoundary.TrimBox
member.summary: The dimensions of the finished page after trimming. Defaults to the crop box.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PageCollection
member.summary: A collection of Page objects.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PageCollection.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a PageCollection from a Stream containing a PDF and password
member.param: A stream that must be positioned to the beginning of a PDF
The password to use to open the PDF

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Pages
member.summary: Collection of pages inside a PDF document. Non-creatable. Obtained through the Document.Pages property of the Document class.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Pages.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of pages.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Pages.Item
member.summary: Retrieve a page by 0-based index.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder
member.remarks: To support reading JPEG2000 and JBIG2 compressed PDF files, you must distribute the Atalasoft.dotImage.Jbig2.dll,Atalasoft.dotImage.Jpeg2000.dll, and AtalaJp2.dll alongside your Atalasoft.dotImage.PdfRasterizer.dll. However you are not required to distribute these dependencies if you do not wish to support JP2 or JBIG images within PDF files.
member.summary: A MultiFramedImageDecoder used to read PDF pages as images from a Stream.

member.name: O:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.#ctor
member.overloads: Initializes a new instance of a PdfDecoder.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a PdfDecoder.

member.name: O:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.Dispose
member.overloads: Releases all resources managed by this object.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources managed by this object.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.IsValidFormat(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Returns true if and only if the specified Stream contains a PDF document.
member.returns: True if and only if the specified Stream contains a PDF document.
member.param: The Stream that holds the PDF document to verify. It is assumed that the stream position points is at the start of the PDF document.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.GetFrameCount(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Returns the number of pages in a PDF document.
member.param: The Stream that holds the PDF document. It is assumed that the Stream position points is at the start of the PDF document.

member.name: O:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.GetImageInfo
member.overloads: Returns information about the PDF without decoding it.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.GetImageInfo(System.IO.Stream)
member.remarks: To obtain the PDF specific information, the ImageInfo return value must be cast to a PdfImageInfo.
member.summary: Returns information about the first page of the PDF document.
member.param: The Stream that holds the PDF document. It is assumed that the Stream position points is at the start of the PDF document.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.GetImageInfo(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32)
member.remarks: To obtain the PDF specific information, the ImageInfo return value must be cast to a PdfImageInfo.
member.summary: Returns information about the given page of the PDF document.
member.param: The Stream that holds the PDF document. It is assumed that the Stream position points is at the start of the PDF document.
The zero-based index of the page from which to return information.

member.name: O:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.Read
member.overloads: Read a PDF document as an AtalaImage.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.Read(System.IO.Stream,Atalasoft.Imaging.ProgressEventHandler)
member.summary: Read a PDF document and return the first page as an AtalaImage.
member.param: The stream that holds the PDF document. It is assumed that the stream position points is at the start of the PDF document.
The progress delegate. Can be set to null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.Read(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,Atalasoft.Imaging.ProgressEventHandler)
member.summary: Read a PDF document and return the given page as an AtalaImage.
member.param: The stream that holds the PDF document. It is assumed that the stream position points is at the start of the PDF document.
The zero-based index of the page from which to return information.
The progress delegate. Can be set to null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.ReadRegion(System.IO.Stream,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Int32,Atalasoft.Imaging.ProgressEventHandler)
member.summary: Reads a rectangle region from the PDF. This uses memory proportional to the size of the region.
member.returns: An image that is the size of the region passed in with only a portion of the PDF rendered to it.
member.param: A stream positioned to the beginning of a PDF
A rectangle region to render.
The page number of the PDF to render starting from zero
A progress handler

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.MINRESOLUTION
member.summary: The minimum resolution that PDF's can be read at.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.MAXRESOLUTION
member.summary: The maximum resolution that PDF's can be read at.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.Password
member.summary: The password for the PDF or null for no password

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.Resolution
member.value: The resolution at which to render a PDF page.
member.summary: Gets or sets the resolution at which to render a PDF page.
member.remarks: Note that in general rendering a PDF page will cause embedded images to be up- or down-sampled. To retrieve embedded images at their original sample rate, use the Page.ExtractImages method.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.SmoothingMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying whether and how smoothing (antialiasing) is applied to lines, curves, and edges of filled areas and text.
member.remarks: In contrast to GDI+, the smoothing mode does effect text. This follows from the fact that the PDF decoder draws text as bezier curves.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfDecoder.RenderSettings
member.summary: Used to indicate how to render the PDF. For example, whether to show Annotations and which ones to show.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfImageInfo
member.summary: Includes information about an image that is created from a PDF page using the PdfDecoder.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfImageInfo.Author
member.value: The person who authored this document.
member.summary: Gets the person who authored this document.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfImageInfo.Creator
member.value: The application that created this document before it was converted to PDF.
member.summary: Gets the application that created this document before it was converted to PDF.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfImageInfo.Keywords
member.summary: Gets the keywords of this document.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfImageInfo.Producer
member.value: The application or module that created this PDF document.
member.summary: Gets the application or module that created this PDF document.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfImageInfo.Subject
member.summary: Gets the subject of this document.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfImageInfo.Title
member.summary: Gets the title of this document.

member.summary: Encapsulates all settings that control the render process.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.Summary
member.summary: Provides a summary of the rasterization process. This class is currently empty and has been added for future extension.
member.remarks: An instance of this class is returned by the Page.Draw method.
